name: gameyfin
description: Gameyfin is a self-hosted media and game cataloging platform using Jellyfin UI principles. It allows adding ROMs, metadata scraping, and browsing games via web UI, ideal for retro or modern gaming setups.

features.title: REST API
features.description: Index and organize ROMs and game files with automatic metadata scraping from online databases

features.title: Web Interface
features.description: Browse your game collection through a familiar, media-server-inspired web UI

features.title: Metadata Scraping
features.description: Automatically fetch game information, artwork, and descriptions for comprehensive cataloging

features.title: Retro Gaming Focus
features.description: Optimized for retro game collections with support for classic console ROMs and emulators

features.title: Mobile Responsive
features.description: Access your game library from any device through a responsive web interface

features.title: Media Library
features.description: Combine game and media cataloging using Jellyfin's proven UI design principles

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Maintain complete control over your gaming collection without cloud dependencies
